name: LibrarySongs.Relationships
desc: The relationships for a library song resource.

items.name: albums
items.desc: The library albums associated with the song. By default, albums not included. Fetch limits: 10 default, 10 maximum.

items.name: artists
items.desc: The library artists associated with the song. By default, artists not included. Fetch limits: 10 default, 10 maximum.

items.name: catalog
items.desc: The song in the Apple Music catalog the library song is associated with, when known.Fetch limits: None.
